prompts.text: Rock Paper Scissors Tournament! %s challenges anyone. Winner stays, loser drinks!
Song Lyrics! %s sings a line, %s must continue. Fail = drink!
Two Truths and a Lie! %s tells three things. Group guesses the lie!
Spelling Bee! %s picks a hard word. Go around spelling. First to mess up drinks!
Would You Rather! %s asks, everyone points to their choice. Minority drinks!
Trivia! %s asks a question. First wrong answer drinks!
Tongue Twister! %s picks one. Go around saying it 3 times fast. First to fail drinks!
Charades! %s acts out a movie. First to guess gives out 3 drinks!
Viking Mode! When someone drinks, they must say 'SKOL' first!
prompts.secondary: Viking Mode is over! Drink freely, warriors!

prompts.text: 20 Questions! %s thinks of something. Group has 20 yes/no questions to guess!
Flip Cup Battle! %s vs %s - flip your cup! Loser drinks!
Story Time! %s starts a story with one sentence. Go around adding. Hesitation = drink!
Heads Up! %s holds phone on forehead. Group gives clues for 60 seconds!
Dance Off! %s and %s dance battle. Group votes. Loser drinks!
Name That Tune! %s hums a song. First to guess it gives out 2 drinks!
